caption.p: SDS-PAGE gels of the Mtb his-tagged kinases purified from E. coli BL21 (DE3). M represents the molecular mass marker (PageRuler™ Plus Pre-stained Protein Ladder, Thermo Scientific, USA) with the sizes of the bands indicated to the left of the gels in kDa. a NDK, 14,4 kDa. b HSK, 33.4 kDa. c AK, 43.7 kDa. d GK, 58.2 kDa. e ThiL, 36.4 kDa. f RBKS, 32.3 kDa. g AsK alpha, 44.6 kDa and AsK beta, 18 kDa. h SK, 20.7 kDa
